trans-unit.source: To install Update 1.2 from Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: To install Update 1.2 from Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to download the software update.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to download the software update.

trans-unit.source: Start Internet Explorer and navigate to [http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx](http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Start Internet Explorer and navigate to [http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx](http://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx).

trans-unit.source: If you are a first-time user, you will be prompted to install a Microsoft Update Catalog.
trans-unit.target: If you are a first-time user, you will be prompted to install a Microsoft Update Catalog.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: Install catalog
trans-unit.target: Install catalog

trans-unit.source: You will see a catalog search screen.
trans-unit.target: You will see a catalog search screen.

trans-unit.source: Enter **3063418** in the search box, and click **Search**.
trans-unit.target: Enter **3063418** in the search box, and click **Search**.

trans-unit.source: Search catalog
trans-unit.target: Search catalog

trans-unit.source: You will see the **StorSimple Update 1.2 Appliance Update** bundle.
trans-unit.target: You will see the **StorSimple Update 1.2 Appliance Update** bundle.

trans-unit.source: Click **Add**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add**.

trans-unit.source: The update will be added to the basket.
trans-unit.target: The update will be added to the basket.

trans-unit.source: Update bundle
trans-unit.target: Update bundle

trans-unit.source: Click **View Basket**.
trans-unit.target: Click **View Basket**.

trans-unit.source: View basket
trans-unit.target: View basket

trans-unit.source: Click **Download**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Download**.

trans-unit.source: Specify or **Browse** to a local location where you want the download to appear.
trans-unit.target: Specify or **Browse** to a local location where you want the download to appear.

trans-unit.source: The update will be downloaded in a **StorSimple Update 1.2 Appliance Update bundle** (KB3063418) folder to the chosen location.
trans-unit.target: The update will be downloaded in a **StorSimple Update 1.2 Appliance Update bundle** (KB3063418) folder to the chosen location.

trans-unit.source: The folder can also be copied to a network share that is reachable from the device.
trans-unit.target: The folder can also be copied to a network share that is reachable from the device.

trans-unit.source: This procedure describes how to install software device update as a hotfix, the disk firmware updates from the Microsoft Update server, and the LSI driver and Windows Updates from the Azure classic portal.
trans-unit.target: This procedure describes how to install software device update as a hotfix, the disk firmware updates from the Microsoft Update server, and the LSI driver and Windows Updates from the Azure classic portal.

trans-unit.source: You could however choose to install software, driver and disk firmware updates all as hotfixes.
trans-unit.target: You could however choose to install software, driver and disk firmware updates all as hotfixes.

trans-unit.source: You will then need to download StorSimple 1.2 SAS Controller Update (KB3043005) and StorSimple 1.2 Disk Firmware Update (KB3063416) and copy to the same shared folder.
trans-unit.target: You will then need to download StorSimple 1.2 SAS Controller Update (KB3043005) and StorSimple 1.2 Disk Firmware Update (KB3063416) and copy to the same shared folder.

trans-unit.source: To install disk firmware updates as a hotfix, follow the instructions in [installing maintenance mode hotfixes via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](storsimple-update-device.md#install-hotfixes-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).
trans-unit.target: To install disk firmware updates as a hotfix, follow the instructions in [installing maintenance mode hotfixes via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](storsimple-update-device.md#install-hotfixes-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The hotfix must be accessible from both controllers to detect any potential error messages from the peer controller.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The hotfix must be accessible from both controllers to detect any potential error messages from the peer controller.

trans-unit.source: To install the software update, access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.
trans-unit.target: To install the software update, access the Windows PowerShell interface on your StorSimple device serial console.

trans-unit.source: Follow the detailed instructions in [Use PuTTy to connect to the serial console](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console).
trans-unit.target: Follow the detailed instructions in [Use PuTTy to connect to the serial console](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console).

trans-unit.source: At the command prompt, press **Enter**.
trans-unit.target: At the command prompt, press **Enter**.

trans-unit.source: Select **Option 1** to log on to the device with full access.
trans-unit.target: Select **Option 1** to log on to the device with full access.

trans-unit.source: To install the update package, at the command prompt, type:
trans-unit.target: To install the update package, at the command prompt, type:

trans-unit.source: Use IP rather than DNS in share path in the above command.
trans-unit.target: Use IP rather than DNS in share path in the above command.

trans-unit.source: The credential parameter is used only if you are accessing an authenticated share.
trans-unit.target: The credential parameter is used only if you are accessing an authenticated share.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use the credential parameter to access shares.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you use the credential parameter to access shares.

trans-unit.source: Even shares that are open to “everyone” are typically not open to unauthenticated users.
trans-unit.target: Even shares that are open to “everyone” are typically not open to unauthenticated users.

trans-unit.source: A sample output is shown below.
trans-unit.target: A sample output is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Type **Y** when prompted to confirm the hotfix installation.
trans-unit.target: Type **Y** when prompted to confirm the hotfix installation.

trans-unit.source: Monitor the update by using the `Get-HcsUpdateStatus` cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Monitor the update by using the `Get-HcsUpdateStatus` cmdlet.

trans-unit.source: The following sample output shows the update in progress.
trans-unit.target: The following sample output shows the update in progress.

trans-unit.source: The `RunInprogress` will be `True` when the update is in progress.
trans-unit.target: The `RunInprogress` will be `True` when the update is in progress.

trans-unit.source: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.
trans-unit.target: The following sample output indicates that the update is finished.

trans-unit.source: The `RunInProgress` will be `False` when the update has completed.
trans-unit.target: The `RunInProgress` will be `False` when the update has completed.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Occasionally, the cmdlet reports `False` when the update is still in progress.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Occasionally, the cmdlet reports `False` when the update is still in progress.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the hotfix is complete, wait for a few minutes, rerun this command and verify that the `RunInProgress` is `False`.
trans-unit.target: To ensure that the hotfix is complete, wait for a few minutes, rerun this command and verify that the `RunInProgress` is `False`.

trans-unit.source: If it is, then the hotfix has completed.
trans-unit.target: If it is, then the hotfix has completed.

trans-unit.source: After the software update is complete, verify the system software versions.
trans-unit.target: After the software update is complete, verify the system software versions.

trans-unit.source: Type the following command:
trans-unit.target: Type the following command:

trans-unit.source: You should see the following versions:
trans-unit.target: You should see the following versions:

trans-unit.source: HcsSoftwareVersion: 6.3.9600.17584
trans-unit.target: HcsSoftwareVersion: 6.3.9600.17584

trans-unit.source: CisAgentVersion: 1.0.9049.0
trans-unit.target: CisAgentVersion: 1.0.9049.0

trans-unit.source: MdsAgentVersion: 26.0.4696.1433
trans-unit.target: MdsAgentVersion: 26.0.4696.1433

trans-unit.source: If the version numbers do not change after applying the update, it indicates that the hotfix has failed to apply.
trans-unit.target: If the version numbers do not change after applying the update, it indicates that the hotfix has failed to apply.

trans-unit.source: Should you see this, please contact [Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for further assistance.
trans-unit.target: Should you see this, please contact [Microsoft Support](storsimple-contact-microsoft-support.md) for further assistance.

trans-unit.source: You will now install the disk firmware updates that are disruptive and take around 30-45 minutes to complete.
trans-unit.target: You will now install the disk firmware updates that are disruptive and take around 30-45 minutes to complete.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to install these in a planned maintenance window by connecting to the device serial console.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to install these in a planned maintenance window by connecting to the device serial console.

trans-unit.source: To install disk firmware updates, follow the instructions in [Install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](storsimple-update-device.md#install-maintenance-mode-updates-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).
trans-unit.target: To install disk firmware updates, follow the instructions in [Install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](storsimple-update-device.md#install-maintenance-mode-updates-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).

trans-unit.source: After the disk firmware updates are successfully applied and the device has exited maintenance mode, return to the Azure classic portal.
trans-unit.target: After the disk firmware updates are successfully applied and the device has exited maintenance mode, return to the Azure classic portal.

trans-unit.source: Maintenance mode updates are not updated on the portal until 24 hours have elapsed.
trans-unit.target: Maintenance mode updates are not updated on the portal until 24 hours have elapsed.

trans-unit.source: You may need to wait before you apply the remaining non-disruptive updates from the Azure classic portal.
trans-unit.target: You may need to wait before you apply the remaining non-disruptive updates from the Azure classic portal.

trans-unit.source: When you are ready to apply updates, navigate to **Maintenance** page and from the bottom of the page, click **Scan Updates**.
trans-unit.target: When you are ready to apply updates, navigate to **Maintenance** page and from the bottom of the page, click **Scan Updates**.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified that updates are available, these include the driver and the Windows Updates.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified that updates are available, these include the driver and the Windows Updates.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install Updates** to begin the install.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install Updates** to begin the install.

trans-unit.source: You are done after all the updates are successfully installed.
trans-unit.target: You are done after all the updates are successfully installed.
